tasks.task: Understand the challenges faced by small and marginal farmers in India.
subtasks: Recognize the large percentage of small and marginal farmers in India (over 80%).
Identify the need for good extension services (market information, credit support, seed quality, timely fertilizer access).
Address post-harvest management and supply chain improvements.
Consider the role of technology in increasing productivity and nutritional value of produce.
Highlight the importance of water conservation technology in agricultural practices.
Discuss the success of collaborations like Mojic fertilizer in education and field demonstrations.
Explain the gap between soil and crop needs and farmer’s practices, and the solution offered (soil testing, package of practices).
Note the impact of such interventions (70% adoption, 20-25% productivity gain).
Acknowledge the disinterest of youth in agriculture due to subsistence nature and resource challenges.
Advocate for consumer awareness and support for agriculture to address youth disengagement.
